pkgmetadata.longdescription: Data Supporting the 'VGAM' Package // Data sets to accompany the VGAM package and the book "Vector Generalized Linear and Additive Models: With an Implementation in R" (Yee, 2015). These are used to illustrate vector generalized linear and additive models (VGLMs/VGAMs), and associated models (Reduced- Rank VGLMs, Quadratic RR-VGLMs, Row-Column Interaction Models, and constrained and unconstrained ordination models in ecology).
